article_title: Smooth ride: Why car maintenance is important
article_text: Charlyn Liechty is the owner of Queen Bee Auto Repair in Springville where she specializes in all engine and transmission repairs on any make and model. Eric Liechty has been a vehicle mechanic for 22 years and manages the shop and oversees all repairs. Please contact us for any additional questions or help at queenbeeauto@gmail.com or (801) 396-7916.
